metadata.Title: CVE-2023-32763 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Qt before 5.15.15, 6.x before 6.2.9, and 6.3.xthrough 6.5.x before 6.5.1. When a SVG file with an image inside it isrendered, a QTextLayout buffer overflow can be triggered.

criterions.comment: qtbase-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtbase-opensource-src-gles package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
